product_name: Brooks Equilibrium Thermal Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Made with brushed fabric that offers a touch of warmth, the women's Brooks Equilibrium Thermal top is equally suited to be a stand-alone running top or an everyday base layer. Supersoft, brushed polyester/spandex blend moves moisture away from the skin and dries quickly. Flatlock seams ensure chafe-free comfort. Long sleeves include thumbholes to keep your hands covered; gloves or mittens are easy to layer on top when the sleeve cuff stays put. The Brooks Equilibrium Thermal top features a reflective trim that boosts your visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: Made with brushed fabric that offers a touch of warmth, the women's Brooks Equilibrium Thermal top is equally suited to be a stand-alone running top or an everyday base layer.
